attributes.action: give Gok Wan a CBE for services to women
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since Gok Wan burst onto Channel 4 with his programme 'How To Look Good Naked' he has helped countless women feel good about themselves and transform their lives, not just the ladies on his show but the millions watching - and all without plastic surgery and belittling people.

On behalf of all of the women who's lives he has changed for the better without even meeting them, I demand that the governement recognises his contribution to making life a little more managable for everyone.
